tool_description: Information about drugs available through an API. Accessible everywhere.
name: MAPI US
title: MAPI US

api_list.name: Active ingredients
api_list.description: Get all the active ingredients associated with a drug.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://iterar-mapi-us.p.rapidapi.com/api/reserpine/substances.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iterar-mapi-us.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://iterar-mapi-us.p.rapidapi.com/api/{name}/substances.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iterar-mapi-us.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Dosages

api_list.name: Drug autocompletion
